content:
RecommendationsOperationsExtensions.List Method

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.Azure.Management.WebSites
Assembly:
Microsoft.Azure.Management.Websites.dll

In this Article

List all recommendations for a subscription.

public static System.Collections.Generic.IList<Microsoft.Azure.Management.WebSites.Models.Recommendation> List (this Microsoft.Azure.Management.WebSites.IRecommendationsOperations operations, Nullable<bool> featured = null, string filter = null);
Parameters
operations
IRecommendationsOperations

The operations group for this extension method.

featured
Nullable<Boolean>

Specify true to return only the most critical recommendations. The default is false, which returns all recommendations.

filter
String

Filter is specified by using OData syntax. Example: $filter=channels eq 'Api' or channel eq 'Notification' and startTime eq '2014-01-01T00:00:00Z' and endTime eq '2014-12-31T23:59:59Z' and timeGrain eq duration'[PT1H|PT1M|P1D]

Returns
IList<Recommendation>

To be added.

Remarks

List all recommendations for a subscription.
